entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 02:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Freezing rain with rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of drizzle overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle changing to periods of drizzle near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
